titleInfo.title: Big Gospel Concert featuring the Blue Ridge Quartet at the Albany City Auditorium

mods.abstract: One color window card (blue on white) Hatch posters announcing Middleton's Big Gospel Concert featuring Blue Ridge Quartet, the Senators Quartet, and the Holy Notes at the City Auditorium in Albany on May 14.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
